# ding-mediaid [![spm version](http://spmjs.io/badge/ding-mediaid)](http://spmjs.io/package/ding-mediaid)

---

decode media id to url

## Install

```
$ spm install ding-mediaid --save
```

## Usage

```js
var dingMediaid = require('ding-mediaid');
// use dingMediaid

dingMediaid.mid2Url('@kg_OAA6cbQ') // return //i01.lw.aliimg.com/media/kg_OAA6cbQ.zip

dingMediaid.mid2Url('@lALOABRv8s0Bg80B2A') // return //i01.lw.aliimg.com/media/lALOABRv8s0Bg80B2A_472_387.png_450x10000q90.jpg


dingMediaid.mid2Url('@lAHOABRwOs0BFs0B9A') // return //i01.lw.aliimg.com/media/lAHOABRwOs0BFs0B9A_500_278.gif

dingMediaid.mid2Url('@lALOABRv8s0Bg80B2A',{imageSize:'origin'})) // return //i01.lw.aliimg.com/media/lALOABRv8s0Bg80B2A_472_387.png

dingMediaid.mid2Url('@lADOAAQgwM0CgM0CgA',{imageSize:'thumb'}) // return //i01.lw.aliimg.com/media/lADOAAQgwM0CgM0CgA_640_640.jpg_60x60q90.jpg

dingMediaid.mid2Url('@lAHOACj4BM0BaM0BbQ',{imageSize:'thumb'}) // return //i01.lw.aliimg.com/media/lAHOACj4BM0BaM0BbQ_365_360.gif_60x60q90.jpg

dingMediaid.url2mid('//i01.lw.aliimg.com/media/lAHOACj4BM0BaM0BbQ_365_360.gif_60x60q90.jpg') // return @lAHOACj4BM0BaM0BbQ

dingMediaid.url2mid('@lAHOACj4BM0BaM0BbQ') // return @lAHOACj4BM0BaM0BbQ
```
